title: RosettaPartialBlockIdentifier
description: When fetching data by BlockIdentifier, it may be possible to only specify the index or hash. If neither property is specified, it is assumed that the client is making a request at the current block.

anyOf.title: RosettaBlockIdentifierHash
anyOf.description: This is also known as the block hash.

hash.description: This is also known as the block hash.

anyOf.title: RosettaBlockIdentifierHeight
anyOf.description: This is also known as the block height.

index.description: This is also known as the block height.
